about_the_game:
Magic Sword is a captivating CRPG that thrusts you into a richly detailed medieval world where strategy and skill are your greatest assets. Choose from one of 14 unique cities as the birthplace of your hero, and step into the role of a Swordsman, Wizard, Musketman, or Mage. Whether you prefer to wield physical might, arcane power, or the disciplined force of a trooper, your journey will be defined by the choices you make and the path you carve.

Compete in a dynamic, synchronous turn-based strategy environment, where all players take their turns simultaneously, pushing the limits of your tactical thinking. You can play singe-player or up to 14 players- play within your household or port-forward to host the game to the world.

Victory is achieved by mastering five key aptitudes: Combat, Knowledge, Capital, Reputation, and Fellowship. But it doesn’t stop there—collect rare Magic Sword fragments, earn prestigious Titles, and outmaneuver your rivals to accumulate the most victory points before the game concludes.

As you explore vast maps and engage in quests, you'll develop your character, forge alliances, and test different strategies. Will you dominate through sheer force, outsmart your opponents with knowledge, or rise through the ranks by gaining influence and wealth? The choice is yours in this intricate and competitive world.

Key Features:
  • 14 Diverse Cities: Each city offers unique benefits and challenges, influencing your character’s journey from the start.
  • Four Playable Classes: Choose between the Swordsman, Wizard, Musketman, or Mage, each with distinct abilities and combat styles.
  • Multiplayer Option: Experience the thrill of simultaneous turns in a strategic, turn-based environment, competing against others or refining your solo strategies.
  • Five Aptitudes to Master: Gain victory points in Combat, Knowledge, Capital, Reputation, and Fellowships to prove your superiority.
  • Magic Sword Fragments: Discover and collect rare fragments to increase your power and tip the scales in your favor.
  • Title System: Earn prestigious Titles to boost your victory points and showcase your achievements.
  • Strategic Map Exploration: Navigate and explore diverse terrains, uncover secrets, and plan your moves with precision.

Magic Sword offers endless possibilities and strategies, encouraging you to experiment and find your path to victory. Will you rise to become the ultimate champion? The choice is yours—dare to resurrect the Magic Sword.
